detectors.description:
YFLinkBalancerYCRVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerYCRVRewards.sol#738-750) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerYCRVRewards.sol#740)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerYCRVRewards.sol#743)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFLinkBalancerYCRVRewards.sol#L743)
